Name: Chaos Theory Pirates
About the game: Chaos Theory – Pirates is a mini-game where you can collect resources, survive, build and craft items to defend yourself against enemies while you keep your crew happy and on your side. Survive by gathering resources, finding food and water or grabbing items washed up on the shore! Build your house from 3 different types of styles to choose from such as Tent, Wooden House and Stone. Craft a multitude of items and tools of various qualities from Common to Legendary and more! Trade surplus items with other renowned pirates to earn gold and spend it on more upgrades. Mange your crew so they stay happy and they don’t mutiny against you, and all while reporting your adventures in the captain’s journal. Choose from various jobs such as Miner, Blacksmith, Soldier and more to give your crew ways to help you in the upkeep of your small town, especially when it comes to surviving the occasional attacks from the undead that roam the island at night. As the pirate captain, stranded on an island, it is your responsibility to look after your crew and return them to safety. Survive the harshness of the changing weather as you experience day and night time in this tropical paradise. Keep the morale of your crew members high so they always stay on your side and lastly, be careful at night as undead soldiers from a long time ago still roam the island hunting for stranded pirates trying to survive their latest adventures.
